price: Orang-orang yang kafir dan menghalang-halangi (manusia) dari jalan Allah, Allah menghapus perbuatan-perbuatan mereka1392.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: 1392.  Maksudnya semua amal perbuatan mereka tidak mendapat pimpinan dari Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā, tidak dihargai, dan tidak mendapat pahala.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
